Reviews.Title: So far so good
Reviews.Author: MJ
Reviews.Content: Using this laptop for basic uses, email, web browsing, itunes, etc.  Got this to replace an 8 yr old Dell Inspiron that took a nose dive.For my purposes, this laptop's performance is great.  Everything seems to run smoothly and quickly.  Still getting used to Windows 8 though.  The screen display is pretty nice as well.This laptop is also VERY lightweight and thin (when closed).  This makes it feel a little on the cheap side, with plasticy surfaces and the keyboard strokes feel kinda light and the keyboard itself flexes (touchpad is nice though). Since I'll use this mainly as a desktop, my intention all along was to set this up with a nice monitor (25") and wireless keyboard and mouse, so these aren't a big deal to me.One other thing: my laptop came with a single dead pixel in the very top left corner.  I can't see it at all unless the screen is totally black, so I don't care enough to send it back (plus I'll be using solely the external monitor)Overall I think this is a very nice laptop with solid features that should satisfy anyone with basic needs.  The laptop looks sleek and modern, but the weight and mechanics of the keyboard downgrade it a little bit, making it feel a little on the cheap side.  I was able to buy it directly from Amazon for $450, so for that price, can't complain at all.  If you're considering paying retail ($700), you can probably find a more upscale laptop for that $$$.

Reviews.Title: Excellent purchase
Reviews.Author: Harish Chopra
Reviews.Content: I bought this product probably a month back and it's amazing. Everything is good in this product except the HP automatic alarms for updates or something. it annoys sometimes.. otherwise the product is good to be used and it's not too expensive to buy. Windows 8 works good on this product.I would recommend this to my friends and family since its sleek n wide design is hard to be found in many other systems.Cheers !!

Reviews.Title: stay away..
Reviews.Author: Jason Kirk
Reviews.Content: I bought this from a different retailer. This has to be the worst HP Product I've ever bought.Pros:10 keykeyboard lay outscreen sizeCons:Mouse hangsWindows 8 hangswont update to 8.1random HP updates - Lost sound last time had to downgrade the BIOS.I really hate this computer. I want to take a hammer to it.

Reviews.Title: Good for the money, not amazing
Reviews.Author: genevieveea
Reviews.Content: This machine is good for the price - we bought several for my office.  It can't handle that many programs at the same time (processor not that fast).  Speakers are nice, and numeric keypad is very convenient.

Reviews.Title: movies
Reviews.Author: joanne m knox
Reviews.Content: didn't realize it did not play discs. my mistake but review did not mention it. it was for my grandson

Reviews.Title: could do better for the money
Reviews.Author: John
Reviews.Content: If you're looking for something thin, lightweight with a big screen this is nice.However, I'm giving it 3 stars because the build quality on the keyboard is very crappy.  The keys feel very cheap and have to be pressed in the right area for the keypress to be registered. For example, if you press the right most side of the space bar down , it will not register the space.It's also sad how HP comes bloated with un-necessary HP software.I ended up returning mine and instead going with a Lenovo Z585.  The keyboard and chassis build feels a lot more solid.

Reviews.Title: Not What I Expected!
Reviews.Author: Donna Evans
Reviews.Content: When I got it back in May of 2013, it WAS the best laptop ever, unfortunately, I have had to return it TWICE for repair. First, HP employees did not send my laptop in customer service sequence as they should have. They replaced the motherboard and sent it back to me. The second time, I returned it, they sent it according to sequence, but it still froze upon the next day returned to me. I finally am requesting a full refund or send me something that is similar or better. After spending a month in the hospital for what I though was a simple foot infection and upon release finding out I NOW have renal failure, this too much of a headache. Two thumbs down, HP!

Reviews.Title: Not Bad but could be better value
Reviews.Author: crystal g owonubi
Reviews.Content: I just bought a few units of the SleekBook and was immediately impressed by the design and lightweight of the laptops. The keyboard material and surface seem a bit cheap for this system. I was also a bit disappointed that it didnt come with a DVDRW insert. i guess i had overlooked that in the spec sheets. Overall i would give this product a 3.5 star. HP is doing a great job at providing options for the entry level Notebook kudos

Reviews.Title: Can it open files
Reviews.Author: nachosnake3
Reviews.Content: I bought a chrome book and it cannot open files can this open files like exe. And rar. And stuff?

Reviews.Title: Good deal
Reviews.Author: MCMC
Reviews.Content: I bought it on sale, and although Windows 8 is the first operating system I've used that doesn't seem intuitive, it's easy to figure out once I go through the user guides. The system is fast, light, very usable.

Reviews.Title: hp notebook
Reviews.Author: Catherine M. Jessup
Reviews.Content: Love my new notebook except for the windows 8 part is hard to get use too. I would take any other windows software over 8.

Reviews.Title: EXCELENTE
Reviews.Author: JOSE
Reviews.Content: DELGADA, LIVIANA, PANTALLA MUY NITIDA, EL ACABO INMEJORABLE, COLOR BELLO, WINDOWS 8, LLEGO EN BUENAS CONDICIONES, COMPRA INTERNACIONAL A VENEZUELA
